description: Retrieve your Incident Manager replication set.

parameters.name: arn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replication set you want to retrieve.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replication set.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: Details about who created the replication set.

nested_items.name: createdTime
nested_items.description: When the replication set was created.

nested_items.name: deletionProtected
nested_items.description: Determines if the replication set deletion protection is enabled or not. If deletion protection is enabled, you can't delete the last Amazon Web Services Region in the replication set.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: Who last modified the replication set.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: When the replication set was last updated.

nested_items.name: regionMap
nested_items.description: The map between each Amazon Web Services Region in your replication set and the KMS key that's used to encrypt the data in that Region.

nested_items.name: sseKmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the KMS key used to encrypt the data in this Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the Amazon Web Services Region in the replication set.

nested_items.name: statusMessage
nested_items.description: Information displayed about the status of the Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: statusUpdateDateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when Incident Manager updated the status of the Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the replication set. If the replication set is still pending, you can't use Incident Manager functionality.
